EmailTemplate.name: Certification-Notification For the DuPont Admin
EmailTemplate.subject: To DuPont Admin notice to review Certification Nomination
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DuPont Admin,
Candidate {!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c} has completed training and exam for certification. Please review the candidate contact and nomination information for completeness and select appropriate next stage. Click on this link to access account.
Click on this link to View the Record
